hero.description: We created the digital twin of a Venture Capital Analyst. No bias, no fatigue, just validation based on pure data.

problem.title: The Opportunity Cost
problem.subtitle: Why Founders Fail
problem.description: The startup ecosystem is plagued by a "build first" mentality. Passionate founders often fall in love with their solution before understanding the problem.
problem.quote: Code is expensive. Validation should be cheap.
problem.explanation: Every line of code written for an unvalidated idea is technical debt from day one. Validator AI exists to solve the "Build Trap" by forcing a rigorous architectural review of the business model before spending a single dollar on development.

gemini.title: Gemini Enterprise Logic
gemini.description: We leverage Google's most advanced reasoning models to simulate the skeptical mindset of an investor, looking for logical gaps in your plan.

grounding.title: Grounding (Live Search)
grounding.description: LLMs hallucinate. To avoid this, our engine performs live Google searches to verify the existence of competitors and market trends in real time.

financial.title: Financial Modeling
financial.description: We don't just analyze text. We project numbers. Our algorithms estimate initial burn rates and revenue potential based on your specific location.

origin.title: Powered by Disruptivo Lab
origin.subtitle: Born inside Disruptivo Lab
origin.description: Validator AI started as an internal tool. At Disruptivo Lab, we are a software development agency. We got tired of seeing clients approach us with budgets to build products that had fundamental flaws.
origin.story: We built this engine to audit our clients' ideas before taking their money. It worked so well that we decided to open it to the world for free.
